mapper.select: select n.notes_id, n.notes_title, n.praise_num, n.collect_num, n.browse_num, n.create_time, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_head_img from lg.lg_travelnotes n left join lg.lg_normal_user u on u.user_id = n.create_by order by praise_num DESC

select n.notes_id, n.notes_title, n.praise_num, n.collect_num, n.browse_num, n.create_time, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_head_img from lg.lg_travelnotes n left join lg.lg_normal_user u on u.user_id = n.create_by order by create_time desc

select n.notes_id, n.notes_title, n.praise_num, n.collect_num, n.browse_num, n.create_time, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_head_img from lg.lg_travelnotes n left join lg.lg_normal_user u on u.user_id = n.create_by where n.notes_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
